#Text=Decide on a Pet
#Text=When deciding on a pet , you need to make the right choice , and several factors come into play when choosing .
#Text=In this article , you 'll learn how to make a good choice for a pet based on your lifestyle and personality .
#Text=So what are you waiting for ?
#Text=Happy reading !
#Text=Steps
#Text=Evaluating Lifestlye
#Text=Pick a pet that you have enough time to care for .
#Text=For a busier lifestlye , you might want a neat pet that does n't require that much care , which could range from anything from a gerbil to a cat ( this range will be narrowed down later . )
#Text=For a lifestyle where you are n't away from home often and have plenty of free time , you might want a dog that you can spend plenty of time with .
#Text=When evaluating how much time you can dedicate to a pet , think of these factors :
#Text=Do I travel often ?
#Text=Do I want to spend the money it takes on vaccinations and checkups , is it worth it to me ?
#Text=Will I be able to give my pet the time it needs ?
#Text=Think about how much this pet will cost .
#Text=A parakeet , for example , requires a cage , toys , treats , and plenty of food and clean water .
#Text=You 'll need to do some research and see how much it would cost you , based on the pet you were thinking of .
#Text=You 'll also need to think about whether or not your pet would need checkups or feather clippings .
#Text=Think about your money and your needs , and from there see how much financial wiggle room you have .
#Text=Meeting Possible Pets
#Text=Find a pet you know you 'll really care about .
#Text=Go to a pet store and talk to one of the employees about which pets you 're considering , and they can give you lots of helpful information .
#Text=Mention some of the pets you were thinking of .
#Text=If you were , for example , considering getting some koi , ask about the care they require .
#Text=If you were considering getting a ferret , ask to hold one and ask about the care one would need .
#Text=Find a pet that speaks to you .
#Text=If you want to get a dog , you might want to try going to your local animal shelter .
#Text=The dogs here all deserve good , loving homes , and shelter dogs I 've had in the past have turned out to be the sweetest animals I 've ever known .
#Text=These dogs deserve kindness and love , and will be extremely loyal to you .
#Text=Buy the proper supplies .
#Text=You may need to consult an employee about this to ensure you are being thorough .
#Text=Then pick out which cat/bird/gerbil/rat/mouse/guinea pig/fish/whatever you want you liked the best .
#Text=Look for pretty patterns on the fur or a cute personality before deciding which one you want .
#Text=Tips
#Text=The more you spend time with your pet , the more comfortable it will be around you and the more trusting it will become .
#Text=It takes a lot more steps than this to decide on a bigger pet , such as a horse .
#Text=If you are planning on getting a big pet , you should talk to local sellers about the care of such a creature and think deeply about your decision .
#Text=It will cost a lot to effectively care for larger animals .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=It is crucial that you take good care of your pet .
#Text=You need to note any unusual behavior or signs of pain or illness and talk to a vet right away .
